quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Tom Savini and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, douglas. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Tom Savini was born in Pittsburgh, PA on November 3, 1946. As a child he became interested in special effects make-up after watching this movie.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Man of a Thousand Faces

questions.question: Tom Savini did special effects work and had a small acting part in this 1986 Tobe Hooper sequel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2

questions.question: Tom Savini had a small part in this metal bands Be Chrool to Your Scuel video that featured a school full of zombie students.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Twisted Sister

questions.question: Tom Savini was in charge of special effects and plays the biker Blades in this George A. Romero zombie film set in a shopping mall.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dawn of the Dead

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oceans Twelve

questions.question: Tom Savini did special effects work and played a small role in this Dario Argento film about a serial killer who murders his victims with a garrote.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Trauma

questions.question: What did actor Michael Douglas say to Catherine Zeta-Jones when they met?

options.text: Id like to father your children.
Ill make your dreams come true.
I want to spend my lifetime loving you.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Id like to father your children.

questions.question: Tom Savini plays a biker called Sex Machine in this movie about two fugitives that kidnap a family and spend the night in a Mexican strip club filled with vampires.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From Dusk Till Dawn

questions.question: For her performance in what movie did Catherine Zeta-Jones receive an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chicago

questions.question: Where is Tom Savinis Special Effects Make-Up school?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Monessen, Pennsylvania

questions.question: Tom Savini did special effects for and had a small acting part in this movie about a vampire who sedates women with an injection of narcotics, slices their wrists open with a razor blade and drinks their blood.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Martin

questions.question: In which of these movies did Catherine Zeta-Jones star while she was pregnant with her first child?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Traffic

questions.question: Tom Savini had a small acting part and did special effects for this movie about a serial killer who scalps his victims.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maniac

questions.question: Who did Catherine Zeta-Jones and Michael Douglas name their son Dylan after?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A poet

questions.question: Tom Savini plays Jesus Christ in this 2002 film about two cops who fight against the evil Hellspawn that was shot for $10,000.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zombiegeddon
